subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Wright ran for 105 yards and 3 touchdowns and No. 25 Louisville opened the game with three long scoring drives en route to a 32-14 victory against visiting Kentucky
snippet: Jeremy Wright ran for 105 yards and 3 touchdowns and No. 25 Louisville opened the game with three long scoring drives en route to a 32-14 victory against visiting Kentucky
